identity.core_philosophy: Appetizing Efficiency. The UI should feel as fresh as the food (Customer) and as sharp as a chef's knife (Staff).

usage_rules.headings: Use Plus Jakarta Sans for all page titles and major section headers. Keep tracking tight.
usage_rules.kitchen_display: Use massive font sizes (text-3xl+) for Kitchen Ticket items for distance readability.
usage_rules.menu_price: Use font-semibold and primary color for prices.

theme_strategy.customer_menu: Light Mode ONLY. Fresh, clean, appetizing. White backgrounds, orange accents.
theme_strategy.kitchen_panel: Dark Mode PREFERRED. Reduces glare in bright kitchens, high contrast for tickets.

layout.spacing_system: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for cards. Gap-6 for grids.

grid_system.dashboard: grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-6. Sidebar is fixed w-64.
grid_system.menu: grid-cols-1 (mobile) to grid-cols-3 (desktop). Focus on vertical scroll.
grid_system.kitchen: grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-4. Masonry-like ticket layout.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-sm rounded-full px-8
buttons.menu_action: h-12 w-12 rounded-full bg-primary text-white flex items-center justify-center shadow-lg active:scale-90 transition-transform

cards.dashboard: bg-card border border-border/50 shadow-sm rounded-xl p-6 hover:shadow-md transition-shadow
cards.menu_item: bg-card border-none shadow-md rounded-2xl overflow-hidden flex flex-col h-full
cards.ticket: bg-white dark:bg-slate-800 border-l-4 border-primary shadow-md rounded-r-lg p-4

inputs.default: h-11 rounded-lg border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

media.icons: Use Lucide React icons. Stroke width 1.5px for elegance, 2px for UI controls.

motion.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }}

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text on orange buttons is White. Text on light orange backgrounds must be Dark Orange or Black.
accessibility.touch_targets: Minimum 44x44px for all mobile interactions (QR Menu).
accessibility.kitchen_readability: High contrast text for kitchen tickets (Black on White or White on Dark Slate).

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a multi-tenant SaaS. Ensure strict separation of concerns between panels.
instructions_to_main_agent.auth_flow: Implement separate login flows for Admin, Owner, Kitchen, Cashier. QR Menu is public (no auth).
instructions_to_main_agent.qr_menu: This is the most critical visual part. Make it look like a high-end food delivery app (UberEats/DoorDash style). Big photos, clear prices, easy 'Add' buttons.
instructions_to_main_agent.kitchen_view: Function over form. It's a tool. Make it dense, high-contrast, and auto-refreshing.
instructions_to_main_agent.mock_data: Use the provided image URLs for mock menu items. Create a robust seeder for initial data.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters where appropriate (e.g., sticky menu headers).
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attribute.
